name: json-to-csv
title: JSON to CSV Converter
description: Convert JSON data into CSV tables by flattening nested structures
content:
Overview

This application converts JSON data into CSV format, automatically flattening nested objects and arrays. It handles both single JSON objects and arrays of objects, making hierarchical data accessible in spreadsheet format.

Features

  • Flattens nested JSON structures automatically
  • Handles JSON arrays and single objects
  • Creates column headers from JSON keys
  • Preserves all data values in CSV format

Parameters

  • Input JSON File: Upload your JSON file from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for the CSV output

Output

The application generates a CSV file named {original_name}.csv with flattened data. Nested keys are joined with underscores (e.g., address_street).

Use Cases

  • Converting API responses to spreadsheet format
  • Importing JSON data into Excel or databases
  • Analyzing JSON datasets in data analysis tools
  • Creating reports from nested JSON structures
